###  Synopsis

In this report we aim to describe the public health and economic problems caused by storms and other severe weather events.

-----

### Data Processing

We are using the U.S. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's (NOAA) storm database. The events in the database start in the year **1950** and end in **November 2011**.

#### Loading the dataset into R

```{r, cache=TRUE}
data <- read.csv("repdata_data_StormData.csv.bz2")
```
